product_name: The North Face GTD T-Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With moisture-wicking FlashDry(TM) fibers, The North Face GTD T-shirt for men has all the performance qualities you want for fast-paced workouts. FlashDry polyester fibers dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive leads to faster dry times and will not wash out. Polyester shirt wicks away sweat, dries fast and offers UPF 15 sun protection; natural particles in the fabric resist odors. Mesh panels at sides and arms promote cooling airflow where needed. Reflective logos on The North Face GTD T-shirt help keep you visible. Closeout.
short_description: With moisture-wicking FlashDry(TM) fibers, The North Face GTD T-shirt for men has all the performance qualities you want for fast-paced workouts.
